articles.title: Sunil Gavaskar responds to Steve Smith's comment on short ball challenge vs India: No one is ever ready for it - India Today
articles.description: Former India captain Sunil Gavaskar has responded to Australia batsman Steve Smith's comment on the challenge of facing short balls by Jasprit Bumrah and Co, saying that nobody is ever ready for the short balls.
